tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr. Nazira ma'am has definitely been a very hands-on doctor during my pregnancy and delivery process. She respects the patient's comfort and concerns *** ******* ***** *** ******* *** ******** ************* which is really very sweet and kind of her. Such a thing is not very common in other OB/Gyn doctors. She answers all our queries and helps us with whatever pregnancy-related issues we may be facing. 

Especially during my labour process, she was  so completely involved that it made me feel at ease and more confident to go through my labour process with her continuous help, advice and supervision even though my labour process was a bit prolonged. She's so experienced and ************* that it surely reduces your anxiety in the labour room knowing that you and your baby are in safe hands. Sometimes doctors can make you feel more scared, tensed and anxious during your labour and it really makes things worse for the patient who is already trying to cope up with the contractions but Dr. Nazira ma'am made sure I was comfortable throughout the process and she always listened patiently to what I had to say during that time. She made sure that I was taken care of properly during and after my labour process and didn't allow any unnecessary disturbances towards me since I had just gone through a lot of pain and exhaustion. 

Even after the delivery, she would visit me every day during my 3-day stay in the hospital to make sure I was healing well and ask me if I have any concerns whatsoever. Not all doctors are this kind and sweet while being so experienced *** ************* at the same time! I'm really so thankful to Dr. Nazira ma'am for taking care of me so well throughout my pregnancy and delivery and even post-delivery. It was truly a very good experience. I would highly recommend this doctor to anyone expecting. *** ** *** **** **** ***** ** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I've been 100% satisfied with Dr Nazira and would like to thank her for being such a great and dedicated doctor. I can tell she likes her job. I'm a foreigner and I didn't know what to expect for gynecologists in India. I've heard that many doctors resort to C-section here even if the mother can delivery normally. Dr Nazira asked for my preferences for different things (type of delivery, if I wanted epidural or not, etc.) and respected my choices. She also monitored me closely towards the end to make sure the baby was OK as I was having some problems. Furthermore, she was present for the delivery although there was an Indian festival which she celebrated that day. I was very happy, relieved and grateful when the registra told me that Dr Nazira was on her way to the hospital as I was told by some other people who visited other gynecologists in another hospitals that their gyne didn't come at time of delivery. I definitely recommend Dr Nazira and Cloudnine Hospital if you're expecting. I got such a great experience thanks to them. Once again, thank you Doctor and thank you Cloudnine!
reply_text: Thank you Solen for your wonderful opinion

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had visited Nazira mam for my pregnancy and I am very grateful to her as she took care of me well throughout my pregnancy. When I first booked appt in cloudnine, I had absolutely no idea abt Nazira mam. But I am so glad and fortunate that I booked my appointment with her. during our First visit, She was very friendly and listened to everything patiently. Mine was considered high risk pregnancy bcoz of bad obs history and from day 1 of my appt onwards, She gave special attention to me. She was always reachable on her mobile and supported me whenever I reached out to her. She took care of me like kohinoor diamond as She used to say. It was a Sunday and When I started getting contractions, She rushed to the hospital immediately after we rang up to her. It was emergency c sec and We were stunned looking at the way She operated . Whatta cool attitude!! I had met so many doctors in chennai and It's hard to find a Doctor with all the best qualities *** * **** *** *** ** *** **** ** **** She is such a lovely person, Very much patient friendly , Very Dedicated to her profession and above all Very caring person. I really miss her after my delivery and looking forward to meet her soon for my next pregnancy. Thank you doctor for everything.
reply_text: Thank you Hemalatha for your kind words. Take care. Happy parenting

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Right from day 1 of my pregnancy I was under Mam treatment. Every visit to Mam made me more comfortable, confident and happy to bring my first child in this world even though first trimester was full of difficulties. Her experience *** ********* made everything so simple. In 5th month I had to shift to Pune leaving Chennai. and now being in 9th month of my pregnancy I really wish it would have been so nice if Mam would have herself brought  my baby in this world by conducting my delivery. It was because of her experience at Cloud nine, Chennai that I chose Cloud nine, Pune for my check ups and delivery. 
Thank you Mam for everything.
reply_text: All the very best dear. Have a nice safe and normal delivery

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We started consultation with Nazira mam from my 5th month. Our decision to consult with her would be one of our life's best decision.She s extremely cool,Calm&Composed. During regular checkups she never scares us or give any complicated feedbacks. She always has a Solution for all the problems. She handles things with ease.If it wasn't her I would have definitely had a C-section, She did her maximum so that I was able to deliver normally. You have given us a lot of memories to cherish for life.To anyone who's searching for fixing your gynac ...I would 200% recommend her. She will your best decision as well.
reply_text: Thank you Nivetha . God bless you and your family. Happy parenting

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: This review was long due. I delivered my second child, a baby boy under the care of Dr.Nazira. She is the most patient and extremely compassionate doctor I have come across, and was responsible for the safe delivery of my baby. I look back on those 2 years that I've known Dr.Nazira with very fond memories.Consulting Dr.Nazira would mean you are in an expert's hands and there would be nothing to worry throughout the entire pregnancy. I take the liberty of contacting the doctor whenever I have doubts and she has always been approachable and kind. Thanks a million to my dear doctor .
reply_text: Thank you Vidya. God bless you and your family

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Actually the Appointment was 5:30..and there were couple of follow ups from hospital as well...But Dr came by 7:30 and finally met around 8:30..really tired of waiting:( . On consultation- She is ok. We went there for a consultation to check whether the possibility for normal delivery for our (MCDA twins)...since every other dr‚Äôs says no option for normal delivery...she said we will give it a try at least...hence would like to prefer here...let‚Äôs see how things are going on...and let‚Äôs hope for the best...
reply_text: Yes. Let's hope for the best

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We consulted with mam right from the first week of my wife's pregnancy and we are so happy that we choose her. She is very calm and friendly and we love her approach towards problems if any. She was always avaliable via what's app if we had any doubts and we trusted her blindly. She took care of my wife like a second mother and  made sure we never panicked Being first time parents. She tried her best for normal delivery but had to perform an emergency cesearen section which she handled with such cool attitude. Am lucky to have been there with my wife in the OT and to have choosen you mam for her pregnancy. Our baby girl was  in safe hands.
reply_text: Thank you very much Shrenic Jain. Happy parenting

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: If you want someone calm and friendly, she is the one to go to. I loved how she would always greet us with a warm smile and made the check-ups an experience I looked forward to. She never stressed us out or made us worry unnecessarily over the entire course of my pregnancy. And she was a rockstar during delivery. She tried and pushed for a normal delivery till the last moment and succeeded. What is amazing is that she kept a cool head throughout, which made me and my husband also relaxed during labour. Would highly recommend her.
reply_text: Thank you dear. You were yourself such a sport and co operated well

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Prenatal Checkup,Post natal clinics,Labor and Delivery,
review:
As a UK expat in Chennai I was anxious to have a doctor who was flexible with my cultural background and generous with their time to ensure I fully understood each step of my pregnancy journey. 
Nazira has been my gynaecologist from 6weeks pregnant and been available at any point for consultation and support. She takes time to clearly explain all elements of the journey and was attentive to my specific requests and concerns. 
She made my experience of first time  pregnancy and motherhood fear-free and relaxed. I feel blessed to have had her, especially being so far from my native home. I would highly recommend her to any expats in Chennai and all mothers to be.
reply_text: Thank you Bryony for your kind words. Take care

review: Her response was very reserved. Did get proper explanations. I'm still confused as to why my period was delayed. And I think 500rs for consultation was a bit high for the way she interacted with us.
reply_text: Spent quite sometime explaining. Possibility of hormonal imbalance.  Reviewed scan . As the patient did not want to wait or comeback, gave prescription and called for review.  All answers cannot be obtained in the first visit  without further investigations.  500Rs is the standard consultation fee in any corporate hospital. In fact it is more. There are patients who do not like to accept that there is something wrong with their menstrual cycle and any missed periods should translate as pregnancy.  Apart from consultation for herself there was additional consultation free of cost for her friend.  Doctors are not business people we are treating patients and we need to do further investigations to know what  is happening to her hormonal status. Diagnosis cannot be obtained with a snap of the fingers.  All patients have to clearly understand this.  With more than30 yrs.of experience we have seen many such patients.  So I shall just let it pass. Thank you
